subject: refactor: remove duplicated content from Overview tab
body:
- Remove Avg Complexity card (available in Breakdown tab)
- Remove Work Breakdown doughnut chart (Breakdown tab has it + trend)
- Update Additional Stats grid from 3 to 2 columns
- Update PDF export to match
- Update USER_GUIDE.md to reflect changes
